properties.entry: INSERT INTO T_EMP VALUES( SEQ_EMPEQ.NEXTVAL, --사원 번호 ?, -- 사원 아이디 ?, -- 비밀번호 (SELECT DEPT_CODE FROM T_DEPT WHERE DEPT_NAME = ?), -- 부서 (SELECT JOB_CODE FROM T_JOB WHERE JOB_NAME = ?), -- 직급 ?, -- 연봉 SYSDATE, -- 입사일 ?, -- 생일 ? -- 사원 명 )
SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM T_DEPT WHERE DEPT_NAME = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM T_JOB WHERE JOB_NAME = ?
UPDATE T_DEPT SET DEPT_EMP_CNT = DEPT_EMP_CNT + 1 WHERE DEPT_NAME = ?
UPDATE T_JOB SET JOB_EMP_CNT = JOB_EMP_CNT + 1 WHERE JOB_NAME = ?
UPDATE T_DEPT SET DEPT_EMP_CNT = DEPT_EMP_CNT - 1 WHERE DEPT_CODE = ?
UPDATE T_JOB SET JOB_EMP_CNT = JOB_EMP_CNT - 1 WHERE JOB_CODE = ?
SELECT * FROM T_EMP WHERE EMP_ID = ? AND EMP_PWD = ?

SELECT EMP_ID, EMP_NAME, EMP_DEPT, EMP_JOB, SALARY, HIRE_DATE, BIRT_DATE FROM T_EMP WHERE 1=1 AND EMP_NAME LIKE '%'||?||'%' AND EMP_ID LIKE '%'||?||'%' AND EMP_DEPT IN (SELECT DEPT_CODE FROM T_DEPT WHERE DEPT_NAME LIKE '%'||?||'%' ) AND EMP_JOB IN (SELECT JOB_CODE FROM T_JOB WHERE JOB_NAME LIKE '%'||?||'%')
SELECT EMP_NO, EMP_ID, EMP_NAME, EMP_DEPT, EMP_JOB, SALARY, HIRE_DATE, BIRT_DATE FROM T_EMP WHERE EMP_ID = ?
UPDATE T_EMP SET EMP_DEPT = (SELECT DEPT_CODE FROM T_DEPT WHERE DEPT_NAME = ?), EMP_JOB = (SELECT JOB_CODE FROM T_JOB WHERE JOB_NAME = ?), SALARY = ? WHERE EMP_ID = ?
